name: Rock Electro Drum Pads
description:
Rock Electro Drum Pads - a new game application simulator, where you can compose your true fashion great music in a rock style! Arrange home Rock concert by connecting the phone to the speakers! You do not have a guitar and amplifier? But you've been dreaming to try yourself as a real rock musician and perform your music? Now you have the chance to do it all just by clicking on a button!
The best selection of bits of samples compatible drums, percussion and electric guitar, all in one unique application! Press or pinch the pad to sound! Each key has its own unique sound!
Music is a state of mind, each person has their own music! Compose with our pad the most unique combinations of sounds and melodies! You can play anywhere on the subway, in the car, even in the classroom with headphones! Attention joke game created for pranks and writing his music and is absolutely safe for your health! Thank you for playing our games! Leave us feedback and we will try to make our games better! Samples and bits will be added as updates!
